Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [C]Crown Him with [Am]many [F]crowns, the [C]Lamb u[F]pon His [G]throne Hark! [C]How the [Am]heavenly [D]anthem [G/B]drowns{,} all [G/D]music but [D]its [G]own. A[C]wake, my soul and [F]sing, of [D]Him who [D/E]died [D/F#]for [G]thee [G/F] And [C/E]hail Him [F]as [C/E]thy [Dm]match[G/B]less [C]King Through [F]all e[Gsus]ter[G]-ni[C]ty.
Verse 2: [C]Crown Him the [Am]Lord of [F]life, who [C]triumphed [F]o’er the [G]grave And [C]rose vic[Am]torious [D]to the [G/B]strife, for [G/D]those He [D]came to [G]save His [C]glories now we [F]sing, who [D]died and [D/E]rose [D/F#]on [G]high [G/F] Who [C/E]died e[F]ter[C/E]nal [Dm]life [G/B]to [C]bring And [F]lives that [Gsus G]death may [C]die
Verse 3: [C]Crown Him the [Am]Lord of [F]Lords, who [C]over [F]all [doth [G]reign Who [C]once on [Am]earth, the in[D]carnate [G/B]Word, for [G/D]ransomed [D]sinners [G]slain Now [C]lives in realms of [F]light, where [D]saints with [D/E]an[D/F#]gels [G]sing [G/F] Their [C/E]songs be[F]fore [C/E]Him [Dm]day [G/B]and [C]night Their [F]God, Re[Gsus]dee[G]-mer, [C]King.
{key:D} {new_page} Verse 4: [D]Crown Him the [Bm]Lord of [G]heaven, en[D]throned in [G]worlds a[Asus A]bove Crown [D]Him the [Bm]King to [E]whom is [A/C#]giv'n, the [A/E]wond'rous [E]name of [A]Love Crown [D]Him with many [G]crowns, as [E]thrones be[E/F#]fore [E/G#]Him [A]fall [A/G] Crown [D/F#]Him, ye [G]kings [D/F#]with [Em]ma[A/C#]ny [D]crowns For [G]He is [Asus]King[A] of [D]all.
Verse 5: [D]Crown Him the [Bm]Lord of [G]love, be[D]hold His [G]hands and [Asus A]side Those [D]wounds yet [Bm]visi[E]ble [A/C#]above, in [A/E]beauty [E]glori[A]fied All [D]hail, Redeemer, [G]hail! For [E]Thou hast [E/F#]died [E/G#]for [A]me [A/G] Thy [D/F#]praise and [G]glo[D/F#]ry [Em]shall [A/C#]not [D]fail Through[G]out e[Asus]ter[A]ni[D]ty
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 crown him with many crowns the lamb upon his throne hark how the heavenly anthem drowns all music but its own awake my soul and sing of him who died for thee and hail him as thy matchless king through all eternity verse 2 crown him the lord of life who triumphed oer the grave and rose victorious to the strife for those he came to save his glories now we sing who died and rose on high who died eternal life to bring and lives that death may die verse 3 crown him the lord of lords who over all doth reign who once on earth the incarnate word for ransomed sinners slain now lives in realms of light where saints with angels sing their songs before him day and night their god redeemer king verse 4 crown him the lord of heaven enthroned in worlds above crown him the king to whom is givn the wondrous name of love crown him with many crowns as thrones before him fall crown him ye kings with many crowns for he is king of all verse 5 crown him the lord of love behold his hands and side those wounds yet visible above in beauty glorified all hail redeemer hail for thou hast died for me thy praise and glory shall not fail throughout eternity

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [Am]Crown Him with many [F]crowns, the [C/E]Lamb upon His [Gsus]throne Hark! [Am]How the [Am/G]heavenly [D/F#]anthem [G]drowns{,} all music [D]but its [Gsus]own. A[C/E]wake, my soul and [F2]sing, of [D]Him who died for [Gsus]me And [Am]hail Him [Am/G]as thy [F2]matchless [C/E]King Through [Dm7]all e-[Gsus]ter-ni-[C]ty.
Chorus: [F2]Majesty! [C/E]Lord of all, let [F2]every throne be[Am]fore Him [Gsus]fall The [F2]King of kings, O [C/E]come adore Our [Dm7]God who [C/E]reigns for[Gsus]ever [C]more
Verse 2: [Am]Crown Him the Lord of [F2]life, who [C/E]triumphed o’er the [Gsus]grave And [Am]rose vic[Am/G]torious [D/F#]in the [G]strife, for those He [D]came to [Gsus]save His [C/E]glories now we [F2]sing, who [D]died and rose on [Gsus]high [G] Who [Am]died e[Am/G]ternal [F2]life to [C/E]bring And [Dm7]lives that [Gsus]death may [C]die
{new_page} Chorus: [F2]Majesty! [C/E]Lord of all, let [F2]every throne be[Am]fore Him [Gsus]fall The [F2]King of kings, O [C/E]come adore Our [Dm7]God who [C/E]reigns for[Gsus]ever [C]more... Forevermore
Tag: All [F2]hail Re[C/E]deemer [Gsus]hail, for [C]He has [C/E]died for [F2]me His praise and [C]glory [Am]shall not [Gsus]fail through[F2]out e[Gsus]terni[C]ty (2X)
Chorus: [F2]Majesty! [C/E]Lord of all, let [F2]every throne be[Am]fore Him [Gsus]fall The [F2]King of kings, O [C/E]come adore Our [Dm7]God who [C/E]reigns for[Gsus]ever [C]more
Chorus: [G2]Majesty! [D/F#]Lord of all, let [G2]every throne be[Bm]fore Him [Asus]fall The [G2]King of kings, O [D/F#]come adore Our [Em7]God who [D/F#]reigns for[Asus]ever [D]more Praise [Em7]God who [D/F#]reigns for[Asus]ever [D]more You're the [Em7]God who [D/F#]reigns for[Asus]ever [D]more
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 crown him with many crowns the lamb upon his throne hark how the heavenly anthem drowns all music but its own awake my soul and sing of him who died for me and hail him as thy matchless king through all eternity chorus majesty lord of all let every throne before him fall the king of kings o come adore our god who reigns forever more verse 2 crown him the lord of life who triumphed oer the grave and rose victorious in the strife for those he came to save his glories now we sing who died and rose on high who died eternal life to bring and lives that death may die chorus majesty lord of all let every throne before him fall the king of kings o come adore our god who reigns forever more forevermore tag all hail redeemer hail for he has died for me his praise and glory shall not fail throughout eternity 2x chorus majesty lord of all let every throne before him fall the king of kings o come adore our god who reigns forever more chorus majesty lord of all let every throne before him fall the king of kings o come adore our god who reigns forever more praise god who reigns forever more youre the god who reigns forever more
